H0.text: Dave Gilmore and Roger Waters were in which rock group. Pink Floyd

H1.text: Dave Gilmore and Roger Waters were in which rock group. The Wallflowers

H2.text: Dave Gilmore and Roger Waters were in which rock group. Queen

H3.text: Dave Gilmore and Roger Waters were in which rock group. Pi5

A4.text: Pink Floyd are an English rock band formed in London in 1965 by Syd Barrett (guitar, vocals), Nick Mason (drums), Roger Waters (bass guitar, vocals) and Richard Wright (keyboards, vocals), with David Gilmour (guitar, vocals) joining at the end of 1967.
